title: Learning about air
creator_credit: ACI Films, Stelios Roccos and Peter Scheer
brief_description: Introduces basic scientific properties of air using simple examples. Shows that air has weight, occupies space and can exert pressure; explains that a combination of a force with air can create energy as in the powering of a windmill. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: ACI Films, Stelios Roccos and Peter Scheer
description: Introduces basic scientific properties of air using simple examples. Shows that air has weight, occupies space and can exert pressure; explains that a combination of a force with air can create energy as in the powering of a windmill. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
description_for_label: Introduces basic scientific properties of air using simple examples. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
